Text: My Xbox recently broke down, I suspect it's a HD problem .. so if I replace the HD with a new one and run this, will I be able to install a new OS ?
If ya box is a hardware mod or if ya got the lock code an hook it up to a pc to lock it with the relevant tools then yeah this will install ya a dashboard if ya boot ya vox straight from disc
the size here on TPB Is 840.92 MB and you write is 485

The ISO itself is 485 MB, but there are add-ons that can be burned along with the ISO using tools that are provided with this torrent. There is also a dummy file in the ISO due to Size limitations that the Xbox needs to be able to handle the CD once its burned.
